text: The Eastern Division is one of four divisions in Fiji. The capital of the division is Levuka, on the Ovalau island. It has Kadavu Province, Lau Province, Lomaiviti Province and Rotuma. Other islands in the division include Kadavu, Gau, Koro, Nairai, Moala, Matuku, Vatu Vara, Naitaba, Mago, Cicia, Tuvuca, Lakeba, Vanua Vatu, Oneata, Vuaqava, Kabara, Moce, and Fulaga. Eastern
title: Eastern Division, Fiji
